column4: HELP!!! i cant boot into ubuntu anymore, i was orignally had no splash screen so i came in here looking for help to get it working someone told me to install start up manager and mess around with it.   i did exactly that installed and messed around with the resolution i believe now it wont boot anymore.  it just sits at a black screen i dont even hit the login screen.  The only way i can get in is to go to recovery console
and then do the exit command and it boots up to the login screen
alexanderwz,  i dont think so

When you boot into recovery mode, what happens? (sorry if have to explain again, I just got here)
i go to a prompt then i type exit to get back into linux

also sudo gdm

what does that do

just type init 3?
yes
